        <script><![CDATA[deleteChildren();

function deleteChildren() {
	
	var tree = new SNC.NestedIntervalUtilities("planned_task");
	var descendants = tree.getDescendants(current);
	
	var descendantIds = new Array();
	while (descendants.next()) 
		descendantIds.push(descendants.getUniqueValue());
	descendants.gotoTop();
	if (descendantIds.length > 0) {
		
		gs.log("Deleting This many children: " + descendantIds.length);
		
		gs.getSession().setWorkflow(false);
		var relationships = new GlideRecord("planned_task_rel_planned_task");
		relationships.addQuery("child", "IN", descendantIds);
		relationships.query();
		while (relationships.next())
			relationships.deleteRecord();
		gs.getSession().setWorkflow(true);
		
		var parent = current.parent;
		if (!parent.nil() && parent.version == 2) {
			relationships = new GlideRecord("planned_task_rel_planned_task");
			relationships.addQuery("parent", "IN", descendantIds);
			relationships.addQuery("child", "NOT IN", descendantIds);
			relationships.query();
			relationships.deleteMultiple();
		}
		
		gs.getSession().setWorkflow(false);
		descendants.deleteMultiple();
		gs.getSession().setWorkflow(true);
	}
}]]></script>
